data.text: Why……why did things turn out like this?――
data.processed: <story>Why……why did things turn out like this?――

data.text: (Clack clack clack!!)
data.processed: <story>(Clack clack clack!!)

data.text:
……! 
Jet Coaster……It's quite imposing in person.
data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed:
<story>……! 
<story>Jet Coaster……It's quite imposing in person.

data.text:
However, as one bearing the name "Invincible", I must overcome it! 
Now――To battle!
data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed:
<story>However, as one bearing the name "Invincible", I must overcome it! 
<story>Now――To battle!

data.text: It was just a few hours ago――
data.processed: <story>It was just a few hours ago――

data.text:
Afternoon on a day off. As I was walking by the station, 
I spotted Yaeno Muteki standing in front of the information board.
data.processed:
<story>Afternoon on a day off. As I was walking by the station, 
<story>I spotted Yaeno Muteki standing in front of the information board.

data.text: Oh, if it isn't Trainer-dono. What a coincidence.
data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed: <story>Oh, if it isn't Trainer-dono. What a coincidence.

data.text:
Right. In regards to my breaks recently, I've been reflecting 
on it a lot lately……and I made a quick decision. First I would 
head to town in order to forget about training.
data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed:
<story>Right. In regards to my breaks recently, I've been reflecting 
<story>on it a lot lately……and I made a quick decision. First I would 
<story>head to town in order to forget about training.

data.text:
However, I am someone who is always immersed in martial arts. 
As embarrassing as it is, I'm unsure where to go.
data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed:
<story>However, I am someone who is always immersed in martial arts. 
<story>As embarrassing as it is, I'm unsure where to go.

data.text:
In that case, perhaps a place made for everyone to enjoy. 
Maybe even someone like her could relax there.
data.processed:
<story>In that case, perhaps a place made for everyone to enjoy. 
<story>Maybe even someone like her could relax there.

data.text:
I see, an amusement park……a sound idea. In a place like that, 
even I should be able to forget about my training.
data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed:
<story>I see, an amusement park……a sound idea. In a place like that, 
<story>even I should be able to forget about my training.

data.text: Then――shall we proceed?
data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed: <story>Then――shall we proceed?

data.text:
And so, that's why the two of us find 
ourselves at the amusement park, however……
data.processed:
<story>And so, that's why the two of us find 
<story>ourselves at the amusement park, however……

data.text: Huuu, it was a splendid Jet Coaster.
data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed: <story>Huuu, it was a splendid Jet Coaster.

data.text:
Oh, well……of course it was. But that acceleration 
during the descent was a sight to behold.
data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed:
<story>Oh, well……of course it was. But that acceleration 
<story>during the descent was a sight to behold.

data.text:
Racetracks also have downhill slopes. I was aware of it, but I 
don't think I can handle them much better than I currently am……
data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed:
<story>Racetracks also have downhill slopes. I was aware of it, but I 
<story>don't think I can handle them much better than I currently am……

data.text:
I was only asking for her impressions, but Yaeno Muteki was deep in 
thought. At this rate, she'd start thinking about training again……!
data.processed:
<story>I was only asking for her impressions, but Yaeno Muteki was deep in 
<story>thought. At this rate, she'd start thinking about training again……!

data.text: Eh――
data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed: <story>Eh――

data.text:
D-dark…… 
Trainer-dono! Where have you gone!?
data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed:
<story>D-dark…… 
<story>Trainer-dono! Where have you gone!?

data.text: Hmm, my eyes are gradually adjusting……
data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed: <story>Hmm, my eyes are gradually adjusting……

data.text: This is――
data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed: <story>This is――

data.text:
Eeeheeheehee! For those that set foot 
in this manor, escape is impossible……
data.name: Ghost?
data.processed:
<story>Eeeheeheehee! For those that set foot 
<story>in this manor, escape is impossible……

data.text: We shall plunge you in to the depths of fear……!
data.name: Ghost?
data.processed: <story>We shall plunge you in to the depths of fear……!

data.text: What did you say……!?
data.name: Yaeno Muteki

choices.text: (Good, if it's a haunted mansion then……)
choices.processed: <size=39>(Good, if it's a haunted mansion then……)</size>

data.processed: <story>What did you say……!?

data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed: <story>――――HAA!!

data.text: Uwaaah!?
data.name: Ghost?
data.processed: <story>Uwaaah!?

data.text:
I'm not one that would be overwhelmed by just this level of darkness! 
Wicked fiend, perish the thought of waylaying Trainer-dono!
data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed:
<story>I'm not one that would be overwhelmed by just this level of darkness! 
<story>Wicked fiend, perish the thought of waylaying Trainer-dono!

data.text:
And now, those hooligans have run away. 
Fufu……I won't let you escape!
data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed:
<story>And now, those hooligans have run away. 
<story>Fufu……I won't let you escape!

data.text: Baaaaaaa~! Eehiihii, were you scared?
data.name: Monster?
data.processed: <story>Baaaaaaa~! Eehiihii, were you scared?

data.text:
Not by something of this level! 
Withstand this if you can, Kongou Yaegaki Ryuu Ultimate――!
data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed:
<story>Not by something of this level! 
<story>Withstand this if you can, Kongou Yaegaki Ryuu Ultimate――!

data.text: Ueeeeehh~!?!?
data.name: Monster?
data.processed: <story>Ueeeeehh~!?!?

data.text:
No, you should get behind me! 
Now is the time to purify this specter――!
data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed:
<story>No, you should get behind me! 
<story>Now is the time to purify this specter――!

data.text:
……All is well. Without being led astray by those wicked fiends, 
it was a good opportunity to train a stalwart spirit――Ha!?
data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed:
<story>……All is well. Without being led astray by those wicked fiends, 
<story>it was a good opportunity to train a stalwart spirit――Ha!?

data.text:
O-once again, I forcibly turned this in to training……I apologize! 
Even though you've gone so far for this, how unsightly……!
data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed:
<story>O-once again, I forcibly turned this in to training……I apologize! 
<story>Even though you've gone so far for this, how unsightly……!

data.text:
This was supposed to be training to discipline myself, 
I end up so caught up in the training that I forget all 
else. It's proof of my immaturity……!
data.name: Yaeno Muteki

choices.text: Then train to forget about training

data.processed:
<story>This was supposed to be training to discipline myself, 
<story>I end up so caught up in the training that I forget all 
<story>else. It's proof of my immaturity……!

data.text:
Eh……? H-however……to have you accompany me in this 
kind of light-hearted matter, it feels inexcusable……
data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed:
<story>Eh……? H-however……to have you accompany me in this 
<story>kind of light-hearted matter, it feels inexcusable……

data.text:
Today, and during my recent breaks…… 
I feel like I'm always inconveniencing Trainer-dono.
data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed:
<story>Today, and during my recent breaks…… 
<story>I feel like I'm always inconveniencing Trainer-dono.

data.text:
That's why, helping anymore than this…… 
I absolutely need to solve this on my own!
data.name: Yaeno Muteki

choices.text: No, I'll accompany you to the end

data.processed:
<story>That's why, helping anymore than this…… 
<story>I absolutely need to solve this on my own!

data.text: I say it firmly. This is the role of a trainer.
data.processed: <story>I say it firmly. This is the role of a trainer.

data.text: However……!
data.name: Yaeno Muteki

choices.text: And a flustered Yaeno is interesting!

data.processed: <story>However……!

data.text: Huh!? Ah…… Is…… that so……?
data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed: <story>Huh!? Ah…… Is…… that so……?

data.text:
It seems like Yaeno Muteki was left speechless. We had a 
good time, so I decided we should head back to school for now……
data.processed:
<story>It seems like Yaeno Muteki was left speechless. We had a 
<story>good time, so I decided we should head back to school for now……

data.text:
The train ride on the way back. 
Yaeno Muteki, who was standing beside me, finally opened her mouth.
data.processed:
<story>The train ride on the way back. 
<story>Yaeno Muteki, who was standing beside me, finally opened her mouth.

data.text:
……is this really fine? 
Once again, I've exposed my shameful side……
data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed:
<story>……is this really fine? 
<story>Once again, I've exposed my shameful side……

data.text:
As immature as I am……I still wanted to be able to remain 
disciplined and devoted myself fully to my training.
data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed:
<story>As immature as I am……I still wanted to be able to remain 
<story>disciplined and devoted myself fully to my training.

data.text:
That's why, your instructions to 『Take a break from 
training』, I suppose I didn't truly understand it.
data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed:
<story>That's why, your instructions to 『Take a break from 
<story>training』, I suppose I didn't truly understand it.

data.text:
And if that's the case…… 
…………
data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed:
<story>And if that's the case…… 
<story>…………

data.text: ……No. For now, I'll think on this myself.
data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed: <story>……No. For now, I'll think on this myself.

data.text: After that, Yaeno Muteki remained silent.
data.processed: <story>After that, Yaeno Muteki remained silent.

data.text:
Indeed……for Yaeno Muteki, who devoted herself to 
disciplining herself through training, this was 
probably a good opportunity to reevaluate her progress.
data.processed:
<story>Indeed……for Yaeno Muteki, who devoted herself to 
<story>disciplining herself through training, this was 
<story>probably a good opportunity to reevaluate her progress.

data.text:
In that case, I had to help her. 
As summer approached, I'd have to keep this in mind.
data.processed:
<story>In that case, I had to help her. 
<story>As summer approached, I'd have to keep this in mind.
